name: Bastard Blocks
description:
[EN]

This is Bastard Blocks. It is designed to give you the pieces you need the least. 

There is a 60% chance that you will get the absolutely worst piece. 20% chance that you will get the 2nd worst one. 15% that you will get the 3rd worst piece. And a paltry 5% chance that you will get something barely useful. You will never get the 3 better pieces. 

You will get frustrated. You will find no joy with this game. Enjoy! (If you can)

[ES]

Este es Bastard Blocks. Diseñado para darte las piezas que menos necesitas.

Hay un 60% de probabilidad de obtener la peor pieza. 20% de obtener la 2da peor, 15% de obtener la 3era peor, y un miserable  5% de obtener algo ligeramente útil. Nunca obtendrás las 3 mejores piezas.

Te frustrarás. No encontrarás alegría en este juego. ¡Disfrútalo! (Si puedes)
